TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NewItemPlaceholderPosition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies where the placeholder for a new item appears in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition AtBeginning = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The placeholder for a new item appears at the beginning of the collection. New items are at the beginning of the collection, after the new item placeholder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition AtEnd = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The placeholder for a new item appears at the end of the collection. New items are added at the end of the collection, before the new item placeholder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The collection does not use a new item placeholder. The position of items that are added depends on the underlying collection. Usually, they are added at the end of the collection.
